attributes.action: Stop SISU gaining control of The Ricoh Arena
attributes.additional_details:
As Coventry City fans, we are deeply concerned to hear that Coventry City Coucil, Arena Coventry LTD and the Alan Higgs Trust are considering selling a half share interest in The Ricoh Arena to our CURRENT owners SISU Capitol.

Over 4 years, SISU have shown themselves to be incompetent and Untrustworthy and we urge everybody involved not to allow this deal to happen.

We would be happy to see a rent reduction but for the future good of CCFC and the Coventry tax payers, we urge you not to allow a deal that gives SISU any control of The Ricoh Arena
